snippet.title: The 39 Steps (digital adaptation trailer)
snippet.description:
Prepare to experience the original man-on-the-run thriller in a completely new way. This is the official trailer for The Story Mechanics' digital adaptation of The Thirty-Nine Steps (aka The 39 Steps). Available now on iPad and Android tablets, and on Windows, OSX and Linux systems. The product is also available on Steam, and can be picked up as boxed product too via Amazon.

"Capturing the intrigue and mystery of the original book, The Thirty-Nine Steps is a visual and aural feast for interactive novel fans." 148Apps.com

"Even if you've read The Thirty-Nine Steps or seen it onscreen, you've never experienced anything like this." April's #1 Mobile App - fiercemobilecontent.com

"Story Mechanics has spectacularly broken down the core elements of the gripping prose and expertly pieced everything back together in a mish-mash of styles that livens up the original work more so than could ever have been imagined." -- Cubed3

"And herein resides The 39 Steps: Collector's Edition's majesty: it's not a videogame for everyone, but it's a videogame for everyone eager to pursue the notion that the interactive medium can enhance narrative structure." -- electronictheatre.co.uk

"It is, in short, the most impressive example of interactive storytelling I've seen." -- The Guardian / Observer

www.thestorymechanics.com/digitaladaptations/the-thirty-nine-steps
